pullRequest.title: HDDS-4463. Verify that OM/SCM start fails when Software Layout Version < Metadata Layout Version.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Add tests for OzoneManager and StorageContainerManager classes that will verify an Exception is thrown on startup when the metadata layout version on disk is larger than the software version of the component. A similar test will be added for the datanode after the DN version file logic is refactored in a later upgrade Jira.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
HDDS-4463
How was this patch tested?
Added tests pass.

commit.message: Switch javadoc at top to normal comment
Add base version file to test resources
Add separate test and utils for SCM
MLV > SLV test passes for SCM

Merge branch 'HDDS-3698-upgrade' into HDDS-4463

  HDDS-4082. Create ZH translation of HA.md in doc. (#1591)

  HDDS-4466. Update url in .asf.yaml to use TLP project (#1592)
  HDDS-4458. Fix Max Transaction ID value in OM. (#1585)
  ...
Move version file test utils to a util class in upgrade

Add unit test for datanode slv < mlv

Fixed typo in OzoneConsts that was causing test to fail.
Use existing exception message assertion from GenericTestUtils
Add integration test for slv < mlv on OM startup

Merge branch 'HDDS-3698-upgrade' into HDDS-4463

  HDDS-4487. SCM can avoid using RETRIABLE_DATANODE_COMMAND for datanode deletion commands. (#1621)
  HDDS-4471. GrpcOutputStream length can overflow (#1617)
  HDDS-4308. Fix issue with quota update (#1489)
  HDDS-4392. [DOC] Add Recon architecture to docs (#1602)
  HDDS-4501. Reload OM State fail should terminate OM for any exceptions. (#1622)
  HDDS-4492. CLI flag --quota should default to 'spaceQuota' to preserve backward compatibility. (#1609)
  HDDS-3689. Add various profiles to MiniOzoneChaosCluster to run different modes. (#1420)
  HDDS-4497. Recon File Size Count task throws SQL Exception. (#1612)

nodes.bodyText: Changing this may break backward compatibility in the Datanode since the value of this constant is written down to and read from the Version file. We can either leave it as it is, or make sure that the writers always use "layoutVersion", and the readers fall back to "layOutVersion" if the default is not present.

commit.message:
Use DatanodeVersionFile instead of StorageInfo for DN tests

This test currently fails, because there is one DN version file per volume.
If all version files have a bad layout version, none of the volumes are used
and we get an out of space exception.

Remove datanode startup test

Logic for DN version files needs to be implemented differently before we will proceed with this test.

Move SCM tests to their own class

Too many issues trying to run the test from the TestStorageContainerManager class.
